content: प्रतियत्न {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Troubling about. {@--2@} Active, vigorous. --त्नः {@--1@} An effort, endeavour, exertion. {@--2@} Preparation, elaboration; <ls>Śi. 3. 54.</ls> {@--3@} Making complete or perfect. {@--4@} Imparting a new quality or virtue; सतो गुणांतराधानं प्रतियत्नः <ls>Kāśi.</ls> on <ls>P. II. 3. 53.</ls> {@--5@} Wish, desire. {@--6@} Opposition, resistance. {@--7@} Retaliation, retribution, revenge. {@--8@} Making captive, taking prisoner. {@--9@} Favour. {@--10@} Acting well or properly. {@--11@} Comprehension.
